wikipedia_page.main: Simon John Manley CMG (born 18 September 1967) is a British diplomat who is UK Permanent Representative to the WTO and UN in Geneva and was Ambassador to Spain from October 2013 to August 2019.

link_mentions.page: List of ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Spain
response: |Simon ManleyChange of Her Majesty’s Ambassador to Spain, Foreign & Commonwealth Office, 19 June 2013

Paxman became Ambassador to Spain on 19 October 2009. He was appointed Companion of the Order of St Michael and St George (CMG) in the 2013 New Year Honours "for services to UK interests in Spain and Mexico." He was replaced by Simon Manley in October 2013.New British Ambassador arrives in Madrid, British Embassy Madrid, 28 October 2013
* Simon Manley, Director, Defence and Strategic Threats, Foreign and Commonwealth Office.
